00068 class HandlerBase {
00069   public:
00073     HandlerBase();
00074 
00078     virtual ~HandlerBase();
00079 
00083     template <class WidgetType>
00084     WidgetType *findWidget(int32_t widgetId) {
00085         if (mpRootWidget) {
00086              gaia::core::Widget *pWidget =
00087                  mpRootWidget->findWidgetById(widgetId);
00088             return dynamic_cast<WidgetType *>(pWidget);
00089         } else {
00090             return NULL;
00091         }
00092     }
00093 
00097     gaia::core::Widget *getRootWidget();
00098 
00102     void setControllerParams(int32_t widgetId,
00103             gaia::ui::ControllerParams *params);
00104 
00108     void setPadding(int32_t widgetId, int32_t left, int32_t top,
00109             int32_t right, int32_t bottom);
00110 
00114     void setRootMarginLeft(int32_t margin);
00115 
00119     void setRootMarginRight(int32_t margin);
00120 
00125     void setPanelWidth(int32_t width);
00126 
00130     gaia::ui::ControllerParams *getControllerParams(int32_t widgetId);
00131 
00135     static const int32_t EXTENSION = -3;
00136 
00138   protected:
00139     static const int32_t ST_CONTAINER_ID = 1;
00140     gaia::core::Widget *mpRootWidget;
00142     DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN(HandlerBase);
00143 };
